Identity Config Operator for Keycloak
=====================================

This is the reference implementaiton of an Identity Config operator that takes metadata from ODA Component CRD's and uses it to automatically configure the security roles for Keycloak (and in the future other services). 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   README.md
   

Python modules
--------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   securityControllerKeycloak
   securityControllerAPIserverKeycloak
   secconkeycloak
